name: Home Before the Rain
description:
Home Before the Rain is a game about two cats in a world severely changed. It is a prototype project created by Wilma and Mira for the final assignment of Test Driven Game Design at the Game Design Department of the University of Uppsala.

If you would like to help us in our studies, please consider filling out the following survey: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSddC_5tYWG2KsV0rw2SV0kHiGpJY-ywUMj94bkx...

All assets were either created in photoshop, or downloaded at https://pixabay.com/
